title: To Chapultepec = A Chapultepec
brief_description: This film provides some cultural background to Mexico, especially Chapultepec to students learning elementary Spanish with the text “Entender Y Hablar”. This is a spanish language film that includes new words which describe what four young people do in the city for fun. Suitable for lower and middle secondary levels.
